name: SARANALAYAM Charitable & Educational Trust
briefDescription: SARANALAYAM (www.saranalayamtrust.org.in)Saranalayam works to bring New Life in the lives of disadvantaged, marginalized people who lost Hope. We take care of Development in a sustainable way.Legal Status: Registered under Indian Trust Act. Reg.No.58/2003Vision:Saranalayam dreams a just order human friendly society where human life is valued and every human being is facilitated to perform his/her fundamental responsibilities to bring about a just order society.Mission:  To give New & Better Life for the disadvantaged.Objectives:o To work for the improvement of the poorest in the societyo To provide educational access to the needed rural childreno To use Information and Communication Technology effectively for the community devel
